name: My Simple Factory
description:
My Simple Factory is a simple game where you own a Factory in the countryside.

You can place machines to automate your process, and you have to deliver goods for the contracts you accepted, and get more money than when you just sell your products.

How does it works?

Accept a contract => create the good => put it in a box => put a delivery ticket in the box so the package now where to go => sent it to delivery.

At the end of the day, your delivery will go away, and you're gonna go home.

Next day, your start over.

Rince and repeat.

This game is meant as an experiment, and no further development is planed, as it gonna stay in Alpha (except if you really want updates and I'll probably complain).

Enjoy the game!
